ocean.question: I’m home to many fish, but I'm not a house. I'm big and blue. What am I?

hints.text: 💧 I cover most of the Earth.
🚢 Boats sail on me.
🏖️ You can find me at the beach.

ocean.question: I have a shell and I move very slowly on the seabed. What am I?

hints.text: 🐌 I am not as fast as a hare.
🥬 I like to eat seaweed.
🏡 I carry my house on my back.

ocean.question: I’m a big, gray mammal that lives in the ocean and sings songs. What am I?

hints.text: 🎶 My songs can travel very far underwater.
🐳 I am much bigger than a dolphin.
💨 I breathe air through a blowhole.

ocean.question: I have eight arms and live in the ocean. What am I?

hints.text: 🖐️ I have more arms than you do!
🦑 I can squirt ink.
🪨 I like to hide in rocks.

ocean.question: I am a fish with a very flat body. Both of my eyes are on the same side of my head. What am I?

hints.text: 🎨 I can camouflage myself to blend in.
🐟 I like to hide on the ocean floor.
🥞 I'm shaped a bit like a pancake.

ocean.question: I am a floating mass of ice that can be found in the ocean. What am I?

hints.text: 🧊 I am very, very cold.
🚢 I can be dangerous for ships.
🏔️ Only a small part of me is visible above the water.

ocean.question: I am a long, skinny fish that looks like a snake. I live in the ocean and sometimes hide in the sand. What am I?

hints.text: 🐍 I can sometimes give you a shock.
⚡ I am not a true snake.
🌊 I can swim backwards.

ocean.question: I'm a group of tiny animals that build a colorful home in warm ocean waters. What am I?

hints.text: 🏘️ Many fish and other sea creatures live in my home.
☀️ I need sunlight to survive.
💎 I'm made of calcium carbonate.

ocean.question: I am a very large and powerful current that moves warm water from the Gulf of Mexico towards Europe. What am I?

hints.text: 🌍 I help regulate the climate.
🧭 Sailors used me to speed up their journeys.
🌊 I am like a river in the ocean.

ocean.question: I am the deepest part of the ocean, a very dark and cold place. What am I called?

hints.text: 🔦 Very little light reaches me.
🕳️ I am a trench in the ocean floor.
🔱 I'm located in the western Pacific Ocean.

cosmos.question: I'm big and bright and give Earth light, but I disappear when it's nighttime. What am I?

hints.text: 🔥 I am very, very hot.
🌞 Plants need me to grow.
🌎 Earth goes around me.

cosmos.question: I am round and sometimes show craters. I orbit the Earth. What am I?

hints.text: 🌕 Werewolves like me a lot.
🌑 I have phases: full, half, new.
🚀 People have walked on me.

cosmos.question: I am a giant ball of gas that shines brightly. I am very far away and twinkle in the night. What am I?

hints.text: ✨ I am born in a nebula.
🌡️ I can be different colors, like red, yellow, or blue.
🔭 You can see me best with a telescope.

cosmos.question: I am a huge group of stars, gas, and dust held together by gravity. There are billions of stars inside me! What am I?

hints.text: 🌀 I can be spiral or elliptical.
🌌 Our solar system is part of one.
🌠 I'm much bigger than a solar system.

cosmos.question: I am a small, icy body that has a bright tail when near the sun. I often visit our solar system from far away. What am I?

hints.text: ❄️ I am like a dirty snowball.
☄️ Sometimes I can be seen from Earth with the naked eye.
☀️ The Sun's heat creates my tail.

cosmos.question: I am a group of stars that make a pattern in the sky. You might see a bear or a hunter in my shape. What am I?

hints.text: 🐻 Ursa Major is an example of me.
🗺️ Sailors used to use me to navigate.
🔗 Ancient Greeks and Romans gave me stories.

cosmos.question: I am a very hot and bright object in space that is far away and sends out a lot of energy. I am found in the center of some galaxies. What am I?

hints.text: 🔥 I am one of the most powerful objects in the universe.
⚫️ I'm related to black holes.
📻 I emit radio waves and light.

cosmos.question: I am a cloud of gas and dust in space, where new stars are born. I am very colorful and beautiful. What am I?

hints.text: 🌈 I can be red, blue, or green.
✨ Stars come from me.
🔭 You can see me with a telescope.

cosmos.question: I am a region of space where gravity is so strong that nothing, not even light, can escape. What am I?

hints.text: ⚫ I am invisible.
🕳️ Matter is crushed inside me.
🌌 I exist at the center of most galaxies.

cosmos.question: I am a giant explosion of a star, brighter than anything else in a galaxy. I leave behind a nebula or a black hole. What am I?

hints.text: 💥 I am the end of a massive star's life.
🌟 I release an incredible amount of energy.
🧲 I can create elements heavier than iron.
